languages.text: "Наверное, в этом я не ошиблась?" {n}На мгновение на лице Ирлиэт вспыхивает печальная улыбка, в ее голосе звенит мучительное сомнение.{/n} "Несмотря ни на что, ты... попытал{mf|ся|ась} сдержать обещание. Пускай ты и из рода, что любит растаптывать любую жизнь, что ему неугодна..."

"I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."
languages.original_text: "Наверное, в этом я не ошиблась?" {n}На мгновение на лице Ирлиэт вспыхивает печальная улыбка, в ее голосе звенит мучительное сомнение.{/n} "Несмотря ни на что, ты... попытал{mf|ся|ась} сдержать обещание. Пускай ты и из рода, что любит растаптывать любую жизнь, что ему неугодна..."

traits.locale_text: "I probably was not wrong about it, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flashes on Yrliet's face, her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your kind is one that loves to trample out any life they dislike..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I probably was not wrong about it, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flashes on Yrliet's face, her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your kind is one that loves to trample out any life they dislike..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我这么想并没有错，对吗？”{n}伊莉耶特的脸上闪过一丝悲伤的笑容，声音里充满痛苦的疑惑。{/n}“无论如何，你在努力……在信守承诺，尽管你们人类会随心所欲地灭绝你们不喜欢的生命形式……”
languages.original_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."

traits.locale_text: “我这么想并没有错，对吗？”{n}伊莉耶特的脸上闪过一丝悲伤的笑容，声音里充满痛苦的疑惑。{/n}“无论如何，你在努力……在信守承诺，尽管你们人类会随心所欲地灭绝你们不喜欢的生命形式……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No estaría yo errada, ¿verdad?». {n}Una sonrisa de tristeza asoma fugazmente al rostro de Yrliet, y la agonía de la duda atenaza su voz.{/n} «A pesar de todo, tú... intentaste cumplir tu promesa. Pese a la afición de tu especie por suprimir toda forma de vida que consideráis indeseable...».
languages.original_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."

traits.locale_text: «No estaría yo errada, ¿verdad?». {n}Una sonrisa de tristeza asoma fugazmente al rostro de Yrliet, y la agonía de la duda atenaza su voz.{/n} «A pesar de todo, tú... intentaste cumplir tu promesa. Pese a la afición de tu especie por suprimir toda forma de vida que consideráis indeseable...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Et je ne me suis pas trompée, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Un sourire triste flotte sur le visage d'Yrliet durant quelques instants et quand elle ouvre la bouche, sa voix est empreinte d'un doute désespéré.{/n} « Malgré tout ce qu'il s'est passé... vous avez essayé de tenir votre promesse. Vous avez même tenté de surmonter la tendance de votre espèce à détruire toute forme de vie indésirable à ses yeux. »
languages.original_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."

traits.locale_text: « Et je ne me suis pas trompée, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}Un sourire triste flotte sur le visage d'Yrliet durant quelques instants et quand elle ouvre la bouche, sa voix est empreinte d'un doute désespéré.{/n} « Malgré tout ce qu'il s'est passé... vous avez essayé de tenir votre promesse. Vous avez même tenté de surmonter la tendance de votre espèce à détruire toute forme de vie indésirable à ses yeux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das war doch nicht falsch, oder?" {n}Für einen Moment huscht ein trauriges Lächeln über Yrliets Gesicht, und in ihrer Stimme liegen Zweifel.{/n} "Wie auch immer, Ihr ... habt versucht, Euer Versprechen zu halten. Obwohl Eure Spezies gerne jede Lebensform auslöscht, die ihr nicht gefällt ..."
languages.original_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."

traits.locale_text: "Das war doch nicht falsch, oder?" {n}Für einen Moment huscht ein trauriges Lächeln über Yrliets Gesicht, und in ihrer Stimme liegen Zweifel.{/n} "Wie auch immer, Ihr ... habt versucht, Euer Versprechen zu halten. Obwohl Eure Spezies gerne jede Lebensform auslöscht, die ihr nicht gefällt ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「その考えは、間違っていなかっただろう？」{n}一瞬、ユリエットの顔に悲しい笑みがちらつき、彼女の声には苦悩に満ちた疑念が響いている。{/n}「何があっても、お前は…約束を守ろうとした。たとえ、お前たちが、望ましくないと思う生命体を踏みつぶすのが好きな種族だとしても…」
languages.original_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."

traits.locale_text: 「その考えは、間違っていなかっただろう？」{n}一瞬、ユリエットの顔に悲しい笑みがちらつき、彼女の声には苦悩に満ちた疑念が響いている。{/n}「何があっても、お前は…約束を守ろうとした。たとえ、お前たちが、望ましくないと思う生命体を踏みつぶすのが好きな種族だとしても…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yanlış düşünmüyorum, değil mi?" {n}Yrliet'in yüzünde bir anlığına üzgün bir gülümseme beliriyor, sesinde acılı bir şüphe yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ne olursa olsun sen... Sözünü tutmaya çalıştın. Kendi türün istenmeyen tüm yaşam formlarını ortadan kaldırmaya bayılsa bile..."
languages.original_text: "I was not wrong to think so, was I?" {n}For a moment, a sad smile flickers on Yrliet's face, and her voice rings with agonising doubt.{/n} "No matter what, you... tried to keep your promise. Even if your species loves to stamp out any life form they find undesirable..."

traits.locale_text: "Yanlış düşünmüyorum, değil mi?" {n}Yrliet'in yüzünde bir anlığına üzgün bir gülümseme beliriyor, sesinde acılı bir şüphe yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ne olursa olsun sen... Sözünü tutmaya çalıştın. Kendi türün istenmeyen tüm yaşam formlarını ortadan kaldırmaya bayılsa bile..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
